title: Desus & Mero | Ep. 142 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Desus & Mero | Ep. 142 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
ALL THE SMOKE is back with a hilarious episode as Matt & Stak are joined by SHOWTIME's late-night comedy kings, Desus & Mero to talk all things NBA & comedy. Desus and Mero open up about their Bronx upbringing's and how they broke into the industry and started their growing show. Plus, they talk about the life of being a Knick's fan and the state of New York sports. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
